column2: We are at war, it's only fair that we may order the local fishers to lend their boats to our army.\n\n§M(ED:PT)§! In contrast to the base mod's decision (where the boats spawn as close as possible to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s location), if you take this decision then the boats will appear in §Ya sea zone adjacent to [Root.Location.GetName]§!.
